channel.title: Client Vote Problem

item.title: Client Vote Problem
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz, post:1, topic:408233”]I found this in my client and every time I try to log-in it says “You Must Vote To Login” and won’t sign me in even if i do vote.

{ System.out.println("response:" + k); loginMessage1 = "Unexpected server response"; loginMessage2 = "Please try using a different world."; return; } } catch(IOException _ex) { loginMessage1 = "You Must Vote To Login"; } } [/quote]

Delete the hole auto vote methode? Also if you found it in your client, But you didnt added it yourself and the vote link works… Looks like a scam?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Vote Problem

item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

I found this in my client and every time I try to log-in it says “You Must Vote To Login” and won’t sign me in even if i do vote.

{ System.out.println("response:" + k); loginMessage1 = "Unexpected server response"; loginMessage2 = "Please try using a different world."; return; } } catch(IOException _ex) { loginMessage1 = "You Must Vote To Login"; } }
